room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We went for my birthday and our group had a blast! This was my favorite escape room so far out of 4 that I have previously been to!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I highly recommend this place!!! This was our group's first time doing an escape room so we did not really know what to expect. We were all a little apprehensive at first but we had a blast. The clues were a little difficult and we really had to think but to us that was perfect. We actually got plenty of fun and excitement for what we paid for. If you are like ok'ing for an escape room experience, this one is top notch!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the as a team building exercise. It was a lot of fun . It was more challenging than I expected. I will be going back to try out the other rooms that they have.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I took my 27 year old daughter and my 15 year old niece and we all had a fantastic time even though we didn't escape. Fun for all ages!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had a great time "breaking out" the night before my brother's wedding. Our ages ranged between 17 and 59. Everyone played a part in the breaking out process. We laughed at ourselves and marveled at each other's ingenuity and creativity. Definitely recommend!
